mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Bassett to Fanny Bassett Washington, 1794 September 8
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bassett, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ill health and business prevented his going to visit her or even writing -- he is even unable to return to Mr. Robert Lewis's [The Exchange, Fauquier County] for Mrs. Bassett -- expresses affection for Fanny and her children, telling her they have an "excellent pattern" in her, while she has "the best of guides, an amiable and benevolent heart." Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, separate cover, laminated, watermark (crown over GR).
